div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. XIII, No. 1, Jan. 6, 1905. THE LITHUANIAN BUILDING AND LOAN ASSOCIATION

body.p: There has been organized under the name of Simonas Daukantas, a new Lithuanian building and loan association. The first meeting was held on Jan. 2, 1905. The treasurer and all the directors are under bond. Meetings are held every Sunday at M. Mildazis' hall, 68 W. 25th St.
All Lithuanians are invited to join this loan organization.
